entry.title: WIND WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
